mapper.sql: data_src_abbr, data_interface_no, data_interface_name, data_interface_desc, data_load_freq, data_load_mthd, filed_delim, line_delim, extrnl_database_name, intrnl_database_name, extrnl_table_name, intrnl_table_name, table_type, bucket_number, s_date, e_date
mapper.insert: insert into data_interface (data_src_abbr, data_interface_no, data_interface_name, data_interface_desc, data_load_freq, data_load_mthd, filed_delim, line_delim, extrnl_database_name, intrnl_database_name, extrnl_table_name, intrnl_table_name, table_type, bucket_number, s_date, e_date) values (#{dataSrcAbbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataInterfaceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataInterfaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataInterfaceDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataLoadFreq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataLoadMthd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filedDelim,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lineDelim,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extrnlDatabaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intrnlDatabaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extrnlTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intrnlTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bucketNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{eDate,jdbcType=DATE})

insert into data_interface
data_src_abbr,
data_interface_no,
data_interface_name,
data_interface_desc,
data_load_freq,
data_load_mthd,
filed_delim,
line_delim,
extrnl_database_name,
intrnl_database_name,
extrnl_table_name,
intrnl_table_name,
table_type,
bucket_number,
s_date,
e_date,
#{dataSrcAbbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dataInterfaceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dataInterfaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dataInterfaceDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dataLoadFreq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dataLoadMthd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{filedDelim,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lineDelim,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{extrnlDatabaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{intrnlDatabaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{extrnlTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{intrnlTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tableType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bucketNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{eDate,jdbcType=DATE},
mapper.update:
update data_interface
data_interface_name = #{dataInterfaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_interface_desc = #{dataInterfaceDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_load_freq = #{dataLoadFreq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_load_mthd = #{dataLoadMthd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
filed_delim = #{filedDelim,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
line_delim = #{lineDelim,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
extrnl_database_name = #{extrnlDatabaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
intrnl_database_name = #{intrnlDatabaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
extrnl_table_name = #{extrnlTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
intrnl_table_name = #{intrnlTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
table_type = #{tableType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bucket_number = #{bucketNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
e_date = #{eDate,jdbcType=DATE},
where 1=1 and e_date >= #{sDate}
and data_src_abbr=#{dataSrcAbbr}
and data_interface_no=#{dataInterfaceNo}
and data_interface_name in (#{condition})
and data_interface_name=#{dataInterfaceName}
mapper.insert:
insert into data_interface_tmp (data_src_abbr, data_interface_no, data_interface_name, data_interface_desc, data_load_freq, data_load_mthd, filed_delim, line_delim, extrnl_database_name, intrnl_database_name, extrnl_table_name, intrnl_table_name, table_type, bucket_number, s_date, e_date,batch_no) values
(#{model.dataSrcAbbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.dataInterfaceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.dataInterfaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.dataInterfaceDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.dataLoadFreq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.dataLoadMthd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.filedDelim,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.lineDelim,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.extrnlDatabaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.intrnlDatabaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.extrnlTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.intrnlTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.tableType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.bucketNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{model.sDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{model.eDate,jdbcType=DATE},#{model.batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

(#{model.dataSrcAbbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.dataInterfaceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.dataInterfaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.dataInterfaceDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.dataLoadFreq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.dataLoadMthd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.filedDelim,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.lineDelim,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.extrnlDatabaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.intrnlDatabaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.extrnlTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.intrnlTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.tableType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.bucketNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{model.sDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{model.eDate,jdbcType=DATE})

insert into data_interface (data_src_abbr, data_interface_no, data_interface_name, data_interface_desc, data_load_freq, data_load_mthd, filed_delim, line_delim, extrnl_database_name, intrnl_database_name, extrnl_table_name, intrnl_table_name, table_type, bucket_number, s_date, e_date)
SELECT data_interface_tmp.data_src_abbr, data_interface_tmp.data_interface_no, data_interface_tmp.data_interface_name, data_interface_tmp.data_interface_desc, data_interface_tmp.data_load_freq, data_interface_tmp.data_load_mthd, data_interface_tmp.filed_delim, data_interface_tmp.line_delim, data_interface_tmp.extrnl_database_name, data_interface_tmp.intrnl_database_name, data_interface_tmp.extrnl_table_name, data_interface_tmp.intrnl_table_name, data_interface_tmp.table_type, data_interface_tmp.bucket_number, data_interface_tmp.s_date, data_interface_tmp.e_date FROM data_interface_tmp WHERE 1=1 and data_interface_tmp.data_src_abbr = #{model.dataSrcAbbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and data_interface_tmp.data_interface_no = #{model.dataInterfaceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and data_interface_tmp.batch_no = #{model.batchNo};
mapper.select: select data_interface_name,count(*) as bucket_number from data_interface_columns where e_date='3000-12-31' group by data_interface_name
select item_type from data_code_config where item_name = '存储过程数据库名' AND database_code = 'tdh' AND database_name = 'dataLoadProc'
